Test Case Description: Verify user can register with valid details
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter valid name
4. Enter valid phone number
5. Enter strong password
6. Confirm password
7. Click Register button
Test Data:
Email: testuser@example.com
Name: John Doe
Phone: +1234567890
Password: Test@1234
Expected Result:
User is registered successfully
Success message displayed
User redirected to login page

Test Case Description: Verify registration with existing email fails
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter existing email
3. Enter valid details
4. Click Register button
Expected Result:
Registration fails
Error message: 'Email already registered'
User remains on registration page

Test Case Description: Verify registration with weak password fails
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter weak password (e.g., '123')
4. Click Register button
Expected Result:
Registration fails
Error message: 'Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase and special character'
Register button may be disabled

Test Case Description: Verify registration with invalid email format fails
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to registration page
2. Enter invalid email format
3. Enter valid other details
4. Click Register button
Expected Result:
Registration fails
Error message: 'Invalid email format'
User remains on registration page

Test Case Description: Verify user can login with valid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter valid password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result:
User is logged in successfully
Redirected to dashboard
User session is created

Test Case Description: Verify login with invalid password fails
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter valid email
3. Enter wrong password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result:
Login fails
Error message: 'Invalid credentials'
User remains on login page

Test Case Description: Verify login with unregistered email fails
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to login page
2. Enter unregistered email
3. Enter any password
4. Click Login button
Expected Result:
Login fails
Error message: 'User not found'
User remains on login page

Test Case Description: Verify password reset with valid email
Test Steps:
1. Click 'Forgot Password' link
2. Enter registered email
3. Click 'Send Reset Link' button
4. Check email for reset link
5. Click reset link
6. Enter new password
7. Confirm password
8. Click Reset button
Expected Result:
Reset link sent successfully
Reset link is valid
Password updated successfully
User can login with new password

Test Case Description: Verify user can search medicine by name
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to medicine search page
2. Enter medicine name in search box
3. Press Enter or click Search
Expected Result:
Search results display medicines matching 'Paracetamol'
Results show medicine name, price, availability
Results are relevant

Test Case Description: Verify search with non-existent medicine shows no results
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to medicine search page
2. Enter non-existent medicine name
3. Press Enter
Expected Result:
No results found message displayed
Empty results list
Suggestion to check spelling or try different search

Test Case Description: Verify search filters work correctly
Preconditions: User is logged in and on search results page
Test Steps:
1. Perform search for medicine
2. Apply price range filter
3. Apply category filter
4. Apply availability filter
5. Observe filtered results
Test Data:
Search: Pain Relief
Price: 0-500
Category: Tablets
Available: In Stock
Expected Result:
Results are filtered correctly
Only medicines matching all filters are shown
Filter count updates

Test Case Description: Verify medicine detail page displays correct information
Test Steps:
1. Search for medicine
2. Click on medicine from results
3. Verify detail page
Expected Result:
Detail page shows:
- Medicine name and brand
- Price
- Composition/Salt
- Dosage instructions
- Side effects
- Manufacturer
- Availability status

Test Case Description: Verify user can add medicine to cart
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to medicine page
2. Click 'Add to Cart' button
3. Verify cart badge updates
Expected Result:
Medicine added to cart successfully
Cart badge shows count (1)
Success message displayed
'Go to Cart' option available

Test Case Description: Verify adding multiple quantities to cart
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to medicine page
2. Increase quantity to 3
3. Click 'Add to Cart'
4. View cart
Expected Result:
Cart shows 3 units of medicine
Total price = Unit Price × 3
Cart badge shows 3

Test Case Description: Verify prescription-required medicine cannot be added without prescription
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to prescription-required medicine
2. Try to add to cart without prescription
Expected Result:
Warning message: 'Prescription required'
User prompted to upload prescription
Medicine not added to cart until prescription uploaded

Test Case Description: Verify user can increase quantity in cart
Preconditions: User is logged in, medicine in cart
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to cart page
2. Click '+' button to increase quantity
3. Verify updated quantity and total
Expected Result:
Quantity increased to 3
Total price updated correctly
Cart calculates new total

Test Case Description: Verify user can remove medicine from cart
Preconditions: User is logged in, medicine in cart
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to cart page
2. Click 'Remove' button on medicine item
3. Confirm removal
Expected Result:
Medicine removed from cart
Cart count decreases
Total price updated
If cart empty, 'Empty cart' message shown

Test Case Description: Verify cart total calculation
Preconditions: User is logged in, multiple items in cart
Test Steps:
1. Add multiple medicines with different quantities
2. Navigate to cart
3. Verify total calculation
Expected Result:
Subtotal = ₹200 + ₹150 = ₹350
Discount = ₹35
Total = ₹315
Calculation is correct

Test Case Description: Verify user can upload valid prescription image
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to prescription upload section
2. Click 'Upload Prescription' button
3. Select valid image file (JPG/PNG)
4. Click Upload
Expected Result:
Prescription uploaded successfully
Preview of prescription shown
File name displayed
Option to remove prescription available

Test Case Description: Verify invalid file format upload fails
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to prescription upload
2. Try to upload invalid file format
3. Click Upload
Expected Result:
Upload fails
Error message: 'Invalid file format. Please upload JPG, PNG, or PDF'
No file uploaded

Test Case Description: Verify file size limit validation
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to prescription upload
2. Try to upload large file (> 5MB)
3. Click Upload
Expected Result:
Upload fails
Error message: 'File size exceeds 5MB limit'
No file uploaded

Test Case Description: Verify user can add new delivery address
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to checkout page
2. Click 'Add New Address'
3. Enter complete address details
4. Click 'Save Address'
Test Data:
Name: John Doe
Phone: +1234567890
Address: 123 Main St
City: New York
PIN: 10001
Expected Result:
Address saved successfully
Address appears in saved addresses list
User can select this address for delivery

Test Case Description: Verify user can select existing address
Preconditions: User is logged in, has saved addresses
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to checkout page
2. View saved addresses
3. Select an address
4. Proceed to payment
Expected Result:
Selected address is highlighted
Delivery address field populated
Order will be delivered to selected address

Test Case Description: Verify user can place order successfully
Preconditions: User logged in, items in cart, address added
Test Steps:
1. Add medicine to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Select delivery address
4. Choose payment method
5. Confirm order details
6. Click 'Place Order' button
Expected Result:
Order placed successfully
Order ID generated
Order confirmation page displayed
Order saved in order history
Confirmation email sent (if implemented)

Test Case Description: Verify order summary displays correct information
Preconditions: User in checkout page, items in cart
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to checkout
2. Review order summary
3. Verify all details
Test Data:
Cart items: Medicine A, B
Address: Valid address
Payment: COD
Expected Result:
Order summary shows:
- All cart items with quantities
- Item prices and total
- Delivery address
- Payment method
- Final amount to pay

Test Case Description: Verify payment with valid card details (mocked)
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Card Payment' option
2. Enter valid card details
3. Click 'Pay Now'
Expected Result:
Payment successful message
Order confirmed
Redirected to order confirmation page

Test Case Description: Verify payment fails with invalid card (mocked)
Test Steps:
1. Select 'Card Payment' option
2. Enter invalid card details
3. Click 'Pay Now'
Expected Result:
Payment fails
Error message: 'Payment failed. Please try again'
User can retry payment
Order not placed

Test Case Description: Verify user can view order history
Test Steps:
1. Login to account
2. Navigate to 'My Orders' page
3. View order list
Expected Result:
Order history page displays all past orders
Orders sorted by date (most recent first)
Each order shows: Order ID, Date, Items, Status, Total

Test Case Description: Verify order details are displayed correctly
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to 'My Orders'
2. Click on specific order
3. View order details
Expected Result:
Order detail page shows:
- Order ID and date
- Order status
- Items ordered with quantities
- Delivery address
- Payment method
- Total amount paid

Test Case Description: Verify order status tracking
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to order details
2. View order status timeline
3. Check tracking information
Expected Result:
Order timeline shows:
- Order Placed ✓
- Confirmed ✓
- Shipped ✓
- Out for Delivery (current)
- Delivered (pending)
Estimated delivery date shown

Test Case Description: Verify user can search doctors by specialization
Test Steps:

2. Select specialization from filter
3. View filtered results
Expected Result:
Results show only Cardiologists
Doctor cards display: Name, Specialization, Experience, Rating

Theme changes to dark mode

2. Logout

Previously selected theme is applied

Expected Result:
User list displays all registered users
Shows: User ID, Name, Email, Role, Status

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Appointments section
2. View pending appointments
3. Select appointment
4. Click 'Approve' button
5. Confirm approval
Expected Result:
Appointment status changed to 'Approved'
User receives approval notification
Appointment appears in user's confirmed list

Test Case Description: Verify admin dashboard displays statistics
Test Steps:
1. Login as admin
2. View admin dashboard
3. Observe statistics and charts
Expected Result:
Dashboard displays:
- Total users count
- Total appointments
- Total orders
- Revenue statistics

Test Case Description: Verify unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes
Test Steps:
1. Clear session/logout
2. Try to access /dashboard URL directly
3. Try to access /orders URL directly
4. Try to access /admin URL directly
Expected Result:
User redirected to login page
Protected routes are not accessible
Error message: 'Please login to continue'
URL changes to /login

Test Case Description: Verify patient cannot access admin dashboard
Test Steps:
1. Login as patient user
2. Try to navigate to /admin URL directly
Expected Result:
Access denied
Error: 'Unauthorized access'
User redirected to patient dashboard
Admin routes are protected

Test Case Description: Verify JWT token expires after timeout
Test Steps:
1. Login to application
2. Wait for token expiry time (e.g., 1 hour)
3. Try to perform any action
4. Observe behavior
Expected Result:
Session expired message shown
User redirected to login page
Token is invalidated
User must login again to continue

Test Case Description: POST /api/auth/register - Create new user
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request to /api/auth/register
2. Include valid user data in body
3. Check response
Expected Result:
Status: 201 Created
Response contains user object
Password is hashed
Success message returned

Test Case Description: POST /api/auth/login - User login
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request to /api/auth/login
2. Include email and password
3. Check response
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response contains JWT token
Token has correct structure
Token can be used for authenticated requests

Test Case Description: GET /api/medicines - Fetch medicine list
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to /api/medicines
2. Check response
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response is array of medicines
Each medicine has: id, name, price, category, availability
Pagination works if implemented

Test Case Description: POST /api/cart/add - Add item to cart
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with auth token
2. Include medicine ID and quantity
3. Check response
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Item added to cart
Response contains updated cart
Cart total is calculated

Test Case Description: GET /api/orders - Fetch user orders
Preconditions: User is authenticated and has orders
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with auth token
2. Check response
Expected Result:
Status: 200 OK
Response is array of user's orders
Each order has complete details
Only user's own orders are returned

Test Case Description: Verify API returns proper error for invalid request
Test Steps:
1. Send request with missing required fields
2. Check error response
Expected Result:
Status: 400 Bad Request
Response contains error message
Error describes what's missing
Error format is consistent

Test Case Description: Verify page load time is under 3 seconds
Test Steps:
1. Open application in browser
2. Measure page load time using DevTools
3. Check performance metrics
Expected Result:
Home page loads in < 3 seconds

Time to Interactive < 3s
Performance score > 80

Test Case Description: Verify API response time is acceptable
Test Steps:
1. Make API call
2. Measure response time
3. Repeat for different endpoints
Expected Result: /api/orders
Actual Result:
Response time < 500ms for GET requests
Response time < 1s for POST requests
Database queries are optimized
No significant delays
